inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient or relatives signs and dates a written informed consent form (ICF) and indicates an understanding of the study procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Decease before the first VAC dressing change
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: unknown
